title: 229 - Remembering the Titans
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a not so full barn as all the boys catch up on their PACKED holiday weekend. With a rather candid start the boys then jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Todays FOD includes an update on Zito’s old tractor, a teaser for East Bond and Down, being able to now edit tweets and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.com/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
